desctiption: In this sprawling metropolis, Banyan Tree Bangkok stands out as a much-needed 'sanctuary for the senses' and a rejuvenating spa retreat. The Only All-suite Hotel, Banyan Tree Bangkok is situated in the heart of the Bangkok's central business and embassy district, offering easy access to the downtown shopping and entertainment area of Silom Road, and the city's sight seeing attractions. A gourmet tour of the hotel will take you to the capital's highest fine-dining establishments: Vertigo Grill (61st floor), The World Highest Open-rooftop Restaurant In A City, Bai Yun (60th floor) and Saffron (59th floor), which turn a meal into a true highlight of your journey through Asia. For relaxation, Guests can visit Asia's Tallest Garden Spa Located On 51-54 Floors.
highlights: ["Banquets & MeetingsTwelve total meeting rooms, able to accomodate up to 170 peopleExecutive RetreatSeveral smaller meeting rooms to accommodate more intimate gatheringsFine Dining on SiteBangkok's highest fine-dining choices, Vertigo Grill (61st floor), Bayun (60th floor) and Saffron (59th floor)Fine Dining NearbyLocated in central business district with other fine dining options nearbyHigh Speed InternetWireless accessPool, OutdoorRooftop poolSpa FacilityTwenty-three treatment rooms with breathtaking views over the cityShoppingShopping within ten minute walk of hotelRecommended RoomsEach of the guest rooms has a panoramic view of Bangkok, with cityscape and river views from floor to ceiling windows over the city."]

tripadvisor review: [{'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'We will be back again', 'body': 'Stayed at this hotel last year and everything was spot on about this hotel - location, services, meals and best of all roof top restaurant. Amazing views. Hotel Concierge helped us to book some tours and advices around food options were brilliant.', 'points': {'Value': '5 of 5 stars', 'Service': '5 of 5 stars', 'Location': '5 of 5 stars'}}, {'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Undoubtedly best hotel in Bangkok', 'body': 'Banyan Tree has been the best hotel during our fifteen days trip in Thailand.Rooms are more than big, with two separate stances. Amenities are great. The quality of the service in this hotel is very good. The breakfast is sophisticated and variated.The best part of the hotel is the moon bar at the rooftop of the building. The pool, located in floor 21, offers great views of the city.', 'points': None}, {'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Honeymoon 2006', 'body': "Very well priced hotel and very modern high class. The restaurant on the roof is amazing and the food is 6star rated. Rooms have beautiful views of city of Bangkok. The infinity pool is breath taking on the upper floors and it's close to financial quarter and all shopping malls are very close by so late night shopping is a must.", 'points': None}, {'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Amazing and friendly service!', 'body': "I have been in Banyan Tree Bangkok from 12 to 16 August.Last day after check out, I was too late and missed my flight due to terrible traffic.I was really upset and embarrassed. I asked your Concierge to help me. Mr. Noom and Mr. Rewaht contacted to Qatar Airways to find later flight and help me to transfer further charge of flight. It was really amazing service for us. They let me to meet Ms. Toon who waited for me at the airport.She helped me arrival at the airport, change to tickets and check-in. Without them, I couldn't come back safely with my 6 years old daughter.  I was deeply moved. I really appreciate your amazing service. I will have been in Banyan tree bangkok this December for holidays and I will choose Banyan tree when I will be away in the other countries. I will recommend my friends to Banyan tree bangkok.", 'points': {'Value': '5 of 5 stars', 'Sleep Quality': '5 of 5 stars', 'Service': '5 of 5 stars', 'Cleanliness': '5 of 5 stars', 'Rooms': '5 of 5 stars', 'Location': '3 of 5 stars'}}, {'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'overview': '2 Thumbs up!!!', 'body': 'This is my second visit in Banyan Tree Bangkok not included with other Banyan Tree brands in Thailand and overseas. Guest services providing must be the highlight as always. Upon my arrival, the welcoming team at front desk really surprised me that even a little detail such as my running nose and a cough caught their attention and made sure my comfort during check in process and rearranged the room assignment for me. What a wonderful treat! I felt special and been taken care tenderly. I stayed in Oasis Retreat room for 2 nights, love it! The cozy feeling paused me in the room, enjoyed my bathing lazily during sunset and good Thai food from room service, so divine!', 'points': None}, {'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Awesome Hotel', 'body': 'We stayed here for 4 nights with the family.Perfect stay..Staff very helpful and attentive.Rooms were very spacious and service was very good.food was awesome .Special thanks to all of you and looking forward to come back.Special thanks to Kapil from Apsara dinner cruise..thanks for looking into all our needs..', 'points': None}, {'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Amazing stay with amazing service ', 'body': "My friends and I stayed here in August. My mum had paid for us to stay here on our travels as a graduation present. The staff went out of their way to help us and made it a very rememberable stay that I most certainly won't forget. The moon bar was shut on the only evening we could go which we were not told about in advance the staff were very apologetic and made an exception for us. We managed to get a private viewing from the moon bar which I have to say is definitely worth a visit even if you're not staying at the hotel. I can only comment on the cocktails from the vertigo lounge but they were amazing and I can only assume the moon bar do just as good if not better cocktails! The hotels pool and gym facilities are also great. The bedrooms are really comfortable with amazing bathrooms and I would definitely recommend getting the breakfast option with your room. One of my favourite meals the whole time I was travelling!! I would love to stay here again. It's an amazing hotel.", 'points': None}, {'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Best Hotel Ever', 'body': "After travelling extensively around the world and staying in lots of nice hotels this has made it into our top 5 hotels!The location is perfect in the financial district of the city which has great transport links with the rest of the city and is near Lumphini park.We stayed in the one bedroom suite which was very large and came with executive lounge access (basically free food and drink all day in the lounge). This is well worth upgrading and you get all drinks including cocktails and prosecco even though the website states just beer.The room was very spacious and had separate bath and living areas. The swimming pool is amazing and very idyllic. You wouldn't believe you were in the middle of the hustle and bustle of Bangkok.Service in Thailand is generally very good but the staff at the Banyan take it to the next level. We got daily exotic fruit in the room, chocolates, turndown service, free dry cleaning and everything was done with a smile.Breakfast was very impressive and included free prosecco and live cooking stations. The Saffron restaurant which is situated on the 59th floor was the best food of our trip so far. Although more expensive than the street vendors (obviously) you are getting a lot more for your money.The best part of the stay was the visit to the moon bar (roof top sky bar!) The views are incredible! The cocktails are expensive for Thailand at around £15 each but are well worth it for the view (+ you get free nibbles and lots of amazing photos!)Definitely recommend a stay at the Banyan and looking forward to staying at some of their other hotels in the chain.", 'points': None}, {'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Always top hotel in Bangkok', 'body': 'Stay here more then 10 times and iam always satisfied with the service and the hotel. Also the location ist very good. The staff is always very friendly and overall its my top hotel in Bangkok. Also the cocktails in the bars are very special. The price is ok for the stunning view and the good quality.', 'points': {'Value': '5 of 5 stars', 'Sleep Quality': '5 of 5 stars', 'Service': '5 of 5 stars', 'Cleanliness': '5 of 5 stars', 'Rooms': '4 of 5 stars', 'Location': '5 of 5 stars'}}, {'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Breathtaking ', 'body': "The date unfortunately is inaccurate, as we have visited this stunning place in June 2014. We have not stayed in the hotel part, so I cannot comment on rooms etc, but we have dined and chilled out in the roof top sky bar a couple of times, as it just took our breath away. The service was good, the prices were a lot higher than anywhere we've been to in Thailand(we have travelled the country for 5 weeks), but it was so worth it. The view is absolutely spectacular, the whole of Bangkok is underneath of you, fresh breeze, which you don't get a lot of down in the streets, the drinks, calm music- perfect romantic evenings spent here. The only thing was that my partner was wearing knee length capri trouser/shorts and me- a dress as it was about 35 degrees, and we had to put on some clothes provided by them(trousers, jackets) to be business like. Next time we knew :) over all great experience, an absolute must see while in Bangkok. Classy, romantic place.", 'points': None}, {'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Amazing hotel, amazing service, cannot fault! ', 'body': "From the second we stepped foot into this hotel it was a dream. The service by all members of staff is second to none - everybody takes time to say hello. Our room wasn't quite ready on arrival so we were escorted to the club lounge for complimentary drinks and snacks. The difference with this hotel and others that we stayed in during our time in Bangkok and Thailand, is the attention to detail. Complimentary club lounge, complimentary shuttle bus into Chatuchak market, complimentary massage at the pool, the turn down service and gifts on our bed each night by the maid. Absolutely fantastic and worth every single penny! Afternoon tea is amazing and definitely worth visiting the Vertigo restaurant and moon bar. Personally I would say the food isn't great value for money, but you're paying for the experience and views which are staggering so would highly recommend. Can't wait to hopefully come back one day!", 'points': None}, {'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Excellent', 'body': 'From the moment we arrived to the moment we left our stay was amazing. We enjoyed our time so much we extended our initial week reservation for an additional 4 nights. Rachel at reception is a delight and so professional. The staff, the room, the breakfast and club room specialties exceeded expectation. I cannot recommend this hotel enough. Thank you Banyan Tree for a wonderful experience! We will certainly be back!', 'points': None}, {'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Great!', 'body': 'The location is good , and the breakfast is delicious. The server serverce here is thoughtful and stuff of banyantree are so nice! The facilities here are satisfied, which has swimming pool, physical gym . And the most grogerous place is the top restaurant , from there you see all the city .', 'points': {'Value': '5 of 5 stars', 'Sleep Quality': '5 of 5 stars', 'Service': '5 of 5 stars', 'Cleanliness': '5 of 5 stars', 'Rooms': '5 of 5 stars', 'Location': '4 of 5 stars'}}, {'rating': '4 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'One of the top hotels in Bangkok', 'body': 'Great service, everyone have been very kind at any moment, room facilities are great, very comfortable bed, the bathroom was really good although it seems a little bit old if we compare it with the rest of the room, and the views from the rooftop bar are amazing.', 'points': {'Value': '4 of 5 stars', 'Sleep Quality': '4 of 5 stars', 'Service': '4 of 5 stars', 'Cleanliness': '4 of 5 stars', 'Rooms': '4 of 5 stars', 'Location': '4 of 5 stars'}}, {'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Wonderful', 'body': 'Beautiful hotel located in the Sathorn area of Bangkok. The reception already gives a good view of what you can expect from your stay. Luxurious, beautiful decoration and exquisite staff. The lobby in itself can already be considered a piece of art. The room are spacious, clean, very wide and have all needed commodities. This has been by far our best stay ever.', 'points': None}, {'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Gorgeous oasis in the heart of Bangkok', 'body': 'I stayed with my three teens in a 2 bedroom suite at the Banyan Tree - the suite was absolutely enormous! Spacious and beautifully decorated with a bowl of fresh fruit ready for us. The staff greeted us with refreshing welcome drinks and flowers. Breakfast, which was included, consisted of a wide selection of foods from around the world in a breakfast buffet. Everyone we came into contact with at the Banyan Tree was gracious and always helpful. We loved our stay here. The hotel felt like a mini-paradise in the middle of a busy, bustling city. We look forward to returning for another stay!', 'points': {'Service': '5 of 5 stars', 'Sleep Quality': '5 of 5 stars', 'Rooms': '5 of 5 stars'}}, {'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'An amazing sanctuary in Bankok', 'body': 'A beautiful place to stay with a multitude of interesting restaurants and bars. We had an amazing time. The staff were so attentative and really aimed to please. The vertigo restaurant was a really special experience as well.', 'points': {'Value': '5 of 5 stars', 'Sleep Quality': '5 of 5 stars', 'Service': '5 of 5 stars', 'Cleanliness': '5 of 5 stars', 'Rooms': '5 of 5 stars', 'Location': '5 of 5 stars'}}, {'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Beautiful stay!', 'body': 'We stayed here for four nights as part of our honeymoon, my husband and I were not disappointed. We were treated like royalty the moment our taxi pulled up outside the hotel. Our room was spotlessly clean and beautiful and our bed was the best bed I have ever slept in. Breakfast was wonderful and had a great choice of food. The roof top bar is amazing and the view was incredible. We loved it here!', 'points': None}, {'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Fantastic stay', 'body': "We have stayed at the Banyan Tree several times now. Our first experience was not the most positive but on our second visit I contacted the hotel prior to our stay to ensure our experience was not repeated (noisy neighbours) and am pleased to say that we did not suffer inconvenience from neighbouring rooms. For our visit this year I again contacted the hotel by email and had a prompt and positive response. The room, however, was way beyond my expectations. We always stay in a 2 bedroom suite but this one was so spacious with a massive jacuzzi bath in the huge master bedroom - I must apologise for the mess caused by my daughters over exuberant use of bubble bath !!!! Both bedrooms had en-suite bathrooms and there was a separate toilet as well. I think this is probably the best hotel room we have every stayed in. Again the staff were polite and efficient and the door men absolute gems. We used the Club Lounge for breakfast and drinks and that was also very good.The one complaint I have with the Banyan tree - and I re-read my original review from 2012 and see that I mentioned it then as well - is that the property is in the middle of nowhere. Taxis in Bangkok are relatively cheap - compared to London anyway - which is just as well because unless it's a special occasion (i.e. Buddha's birthday) the traffic is diabolical. For example a 2 mile journey took us over 45 minutes. We've even given up on a taxi before because we were going nowhere, so got out and struggled onto a metro train. It's about a 10 minute walk from the Banyan Tree to the nearest metro station but even then, it is almost impossible to get on a train as they are heaving too. I'm sorry to say this will be our last visit to the Banyan Tree as we will stay in a hotel convenient to a Sky Train station next year and I just hope it provides the level of service that we have experienced at the Banyan Tree.", 'points': {'Value': '4 of 5 stars', 'Service': '5 of 5 stars', 'Cleanliness': '5 of 5 stars'}}, {'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Superb!', 'body': 'From the moment our taxi pulled up to the moment we left the following morning, I was impressed by Banyan tree Bangkok. We were given a mini flower lei from the concierge and then served beverages during check in. The lobby was gorgeous with a lovely courtyard and our room was super spacious with a fully stocked mini bar and fresh fruit basket.We went to vertigo for dinner and the staff had everything thought out: they had hair ties available for women with their hair down due to the wind.Upon returning to the room, our beds had been turned down and there were cookies as well as mints for us.I was super impressed by the attention to detail and would highly recommend staying here!', 'points': None}, {'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Great & memorable stay!', 'body': 'We had a 2 night stay and it was extremely awesome! The room was clean and the bed was very comfortable! We had a lovely dinner at Moon Bar and the view was spectacular! The food though pricey was a great gastronomical experience & they even gave us a free photograph of us and the view! They even had exercise classes for which we signed up for muay thai and the trainer (Chokchai) was very patient, taught us alot of the basics of muaythai and made the lessons very fun! We have been to BKK many times and this has indeed been one of the more memorable experiences!', 'points': None}, {'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Αmazing', 'body': 'This is an amazing hotel with great service and the best view in town. Differs from other Banyan tree as its a city hotel but with the same tentative approach and care to detail The roof terrace was amazing and worth its reputation. Definately one of the best hotels to stay in town. . Food in restaurants was great too', 'points': None}, {'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Excellent', 'body': '1.Service is Excellent.2.The rooms were very clean.3.Location is Convenience.4.The concierge team is helpful.5.TV is old,The controller does not work well.6.Lobby is Pretty.7.I would recommend it to my family and friends.', 'points': {'Value': '5 of 5 stars', 'Sleep Quality': '5 of 5 stars', 'Service': '5 of 5 stars', 'Cleanliness': '5 of 5 stars', 'Rooms': '5 of 5 stars', 'Location': '5 of 5 stars'}}, {'rating': '3 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'Small swimming pool and men only dress code', 'body': 'Stayed 3 nights with friends to celebrate my birthday - room is a bit aged but very spacey and maintained nicely, staff are in general very nice and respond to inquiries / requests promptly.The only 2 negative things from my perspective:a. Swimming pool is too small for a hotel with this size and number of rooms - it`s always crowded and challenging to find a spot if you just want to enjory the serenity and don`t want to go out. Swimming lovers may need to think about this when booking this hotel.b. There is a dress code only for men that no sleeveless shirt is allowed in seemingly all the restaurants in the hotel - when I went to breakfast in executive lounge the next morning of my first night, I was asked to change my sleeveless shirt for “hygiene” reason; however this rule only applies to men but not women, which does not sound reasonable to me at all. Note that it`s not a formal occasion or decent restaurant but only breakfast buffet in the executive lounge.I would respect the rule set force by the hotel, but until this changes to be equal between men and women, I doubt I will stay here again.', 'points': None}, {'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'overview': 'An Oasis of Luxury in the Heart of Bangkok', 'body': 'From the minute we arrived at the Bayan Tree hotel you feel totally relaxed. The Check in staff sit you down and they come to you. From the doormen to the staff at breakfast everyone was first class. Our room on the 58th floor had spectacular views across the city.It was well worth checking out the roof top views where you will be greeted by the friendly staff. The suite we had was modern ,clean but also had some lovely Thai features We enjoyed the roof top pool. Breakfast was excellent with plenty of choice.', 'points': {'Value': '5 of 5 stars', 'Service': '5 of 5 stars', 'Cleanliness': '5 of 5 stars'}}]

booking.com data: {'description': "Get the celebrity treatment with world-class service at Banyan Tree Bangkok One of our top picks in Bangkok. Banyan Tree Bangkok offers luxurious rooms with views of the city or Chaophraya River. It features a stylish, roof-top restaurant and bar, a spa with pool and 7 dining options.Banyan Tree's rooms and suites are spacious, featuring wooden flooring and large windows. They offer a seating area, coffee/tea maker and satellite TV. Guests may enjoy complimentary non-alcoholic beverages from the minibar. 24-hour room service is available.Banyan Tree Bangkok's health club offers a well-equipped fitness centre, steam room and sauna. Airport transfers are available at an additional charge.Vertigo and Moon Bar offer panoramic views and serves a variety of western dishes. Guests can sample Thai and Chinese specialties. Banyan Tree Bangkok also provides a dinner cruise along the Chaophraya River.Banyan Tree Bangkok is located in Bangkok's central business and embassy district on Sathorn Road. Lumphini MRT Station and Suan Lum Night Bazaar are just a 10-minute walk away.Sathorn is a great choice for travelers interested in temples, culture and sightseeing.", 'points': {'Free WiFi': '8.5', 'Staff': '9.3', 'Facilities': '9', 'Cleanliness': '9.2', 'Location': '8.1', 'Comfort': '9.2'}, 'score': '8.9'}
